member.name: IDWriteFontCollection1.GetFontSet
member.summary: Gets the underlying font set used by this collection.
member.param: Returns the font set used by the collection.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontCollection1
member.summary: An object that encapsulates a set of fonts, such as the set of fonts installed on the system, or the set of fonts in a particular directory. The font collection API can be used to discover what font families and fonts are available, and to obtain some metadata about the fonts.
